citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:00am on 23-APR-
21. The inspector talked to a household member who said the licensee would be gone for the day.
End Section

21.  The inspector talked to a household member who said the licensee would be gone for the day. 
 
 
 
End Section
